original_text: “‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: You are the one I spoke of in former days by my servants the prophets of Israel. At that time they prophesied for years that I would bring you against them.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내가 옛적에 내 종 이스라엘 선지자들을 통하여 말한 사람이 네가 아니냐 그들이 그 때에 여러 해 동안 예언하기를 내가 너를 이끌어다가 그들을 치게 하리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
You are the one I spoke of
in former days by my servants
At that time they prophesied for years
that I would bring you against them.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신을 그들에게 대적하게 하리라는 것을.
